items.title: Monads are just monoids in the category of endofunctors
items.content_text: I explain the mathematical background of a joke-explanation of monads. Contains lots of math and a hasty introduction to category theory

items.title: Using Hilbert Curves to 100% Zelda
items.content_text: Using math, I made it a lot easier to find the last undiscovered parts of my Zelda - Breath Of The Wild map.
